data.question: What is the chemical formula for the zinc-tetrazolate framework CPF-6?
What method was used for the synthesis of H3BTT ligand?
What is the maximum percentage of open donor sites for a tetrazole framework?
Is the CPF-6 framework's H2 uptake capacity close to that of Mn-BTT MOF?
What role does the urea derivative play in the synthesis of CPF-6?
data.answer: It is used as the cosolvent in the synthesis process.

data.question: Does CPF-6 contain open metal sites?
What is the purpose of using a urea derivative in the synthesis of CPF-6?
data.answer: To facilitate the formation of a porous framework.

data.question: Is the CO2 uptake of CPF-6 more than 100 cm3/g at 273 K and 1 atm?
What is the percentage of solvent-accessible volume in CPF-6?
What is the role of concentrated HCl in the synthesis of CPF-6?
data.answer: It is added to the solvent mixture during the synthesis process.

data.question: Does the synthesis of CPF-6 involve heating at 120 Â°C?
What is the yield percentage of CPF-6 based on H3BTT?
What is the significance of the rutile topology in CPF-6?
data.answer: It describes the overall framework structure of CPF-6.

data.question: Is the H2 isotherm for CPF-6 completely reversible at 77 K?
What is the Langmuir surface area of CPF-6?
What is the role of acetone in the preparation of CPF-6 for gas adsorption experiments?
data.answer: It is used to exchange the solvent in the as-synthesized sample.

data.question: Does CPF-6 exhibit type I reversible sorption isotherms?
What is the BET surface area of CPF-6?
What is the calculated CO2/N2 selectivity of CPF-6 at 273 K?
Is the thermal stability of CPF-6 tested under a nitrogen atmosphere?
